title: The Whole Web Pays For Google And Facebook To Be Free
description: (Bloomberg Opinion) -- Google and Facebook make a lot of noise about how their main services are free to use. And it’s true, they are. But what they don’t highlight is their role in making almost everything else we consume online more expensive.
